headline: PTC Inc. (PTC) Beats Q3 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: PTC Inc. (PTC) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +34.43% and +10.57%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Why Dividend Investors Should Watch Salesforce’s (CRM) Innovation Edge
summary: Salesforce, Inc. (NYSE:CRM) is included among the 11 Innovative Dividend Stocks to Buy Now. Salesforce, Inc. (NYSE:CRM) was named one of the World’s Most Innovative Companies for 2025 by Fast Company, recognized for its efforts in sustainable AI and for integrating purpose-built AI tools and agents into Slack for employees. headline: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff on why AI agents won’t lead to mass unemployment

headline: CoLab Adds Experienced Growth-Stage CFO Jake Kornreich to Executive Team
summary: ST. JOHN’S, Newfoundland and Labrador, July 30, 2025--CoLab, the company building the AI operating system for hardware product development, today announced that Jake Kornreich has joined as Chief Financial Officer. CoLab’s platform helps engineering organizations capture expert design feedback, centralize technical knowledge, and apply AI to accelerate product decisions. Kornreich brings a decade of leadership experience in high-growth B2B SaaS businesses, most recently serving as CFO of Own Com

headline: AutoRABIT Appoints Cybersecurity Veteran Patrick Sweeney as CEO to Lead the Company Into Its Next Phase of Growth
summary: AutoRABIT, the leading provider of enterprise-grade Salesforce DevSecOps solutions, is proud to announce the appointment of Patrick Sweeney as its new Chief Executive Officer. Sweeney brings more than 25 years of leadership experience driving growth and innovation across cybersecurity, networking, and enterprise software, with a proven track record of scaling high-growth organizations.
